review_title: Development and Fundraising in Lima, Peru
job_title: Business Development Coordinator in Lima, Lima Region
pros: Plan International is an organization committed to promoting children's rights and gender equality, and they are deeply loyal to that cause.
cons: Heavy load of work, lots of internal processes

job_title: Grants Officer in Lima, Lima Region
pros: Great teams and a great mission
cons: Bureaucracy and no raises for employees

job_title: Project Coordinator in Lima, Lima Region
cons: No payment for overtime, disorganized organization

pros:
If you get a good boss, its great.
Some people really do care about children
cons: Chaos! It changed leadership and it has a lot of bosses and few implementers... lots of people at the HQ, and less and less in the field.
